Class Line

java.lang.Object
Shapes.Line
All Implemented Interfaces:
Shape
public class Line extends Object implements Shape
Represents a line shape with start and end coordinates, stroke color, and stroke width.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Line(String line)
    Constructs a Line from an SVG element string.
    Line(String[] params)
    Constructs a Line from command arguments.

    within(int x1, int y1, int x2, int y2)
    Determines if the line lies completely within the rectangular area defined by (x1, y1) and (x2, y2), considering the stroke width.

    • Line

      public Line(String line)
      Constructs a Line from an SVG element string.

      Constructs a Line from command arguments.
      Parameters:
      params - the array of parameters: [create, line, x1, y1, x2, y2, stroke-width, stroke]

      Returns the SVG representation of this line as a string.

      Returns:
      the SVG format string of this line

    • translate

      public void translate(int dx, int dy)
      Translates the line's start and end points by the given deltas. Coordinates are not allowed to go below zero.
      Specified by:
      translate in interface Shape
      Parameters:
      dx - the delta to translate on the x-axis
      dy - the delta to translate on the y-axis

    • within

      public boolean within(int x1, int y1, int x2, int y2)
      Determines if the line lies completely within the rectangular area defined by (x1, y1) and (x2, y2), considering the stroke width.
      Specified by:
      within in interface Shape
      Parameters:
      x1 - the minimum x-coordinate of the area
      y1 - the minimum y-coordinate of the area
      x2 - the maximum x-coordinate of the area
      y2 - the maximum y-coordinate of the area
      Returns:
      true if the line is completely within the area, false otherwise
